input.sentences: ideas were exchanged at the conference .
people broke into smaller groups to share their thoughts .
larger circles contained lectures and demostrations .
the opportunity to meet leaders was given .
pamphlets were given and taken home .
output.sentences: There were quite a lot of great ideas exchanged at this conference.
There were many opportunities to share those ideas when people broke out into small groups.
We discussed what we had experienced during the lectures and larger demonstrations.
It was a great opportunity to meet and network with other professionals and leaders in our field.
I brought some pamphlets home for you to look at when you have a chance.
